<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ogre Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=814)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These terrifying creatures grow as large as elephants. The placement of their eyes above their wide mandibles evokes the grimacing visage of an ogre's leer. [Ogres](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=78) themselves find the appearance of ogre spider faces simultaneously amusing and adorable, but in most cases, ogres' attempts to keep these spiders as pets result in dead ogres and well-fed spiders.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Ogre Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=814)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 249 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), web sense

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Web Sense** The ogre spider has [imprecise tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 70

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fang +15,
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus ogre spider venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web +13 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** web trap

**Eerie Flexibility**   An ogre spider can fit through tight spaces as if it were a Large creature. While [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), it can move at its full speed.

**Ogre Spider Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 22; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 1, and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 4** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

**Web Trap**   A creature hit by the ogre spider's web attack is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and stuck to the nearest surface until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 22).

</column>

name: Ogre Spider
